getModalitiesForRoom

public java.lang.String getModalitiesForRoom(java.lang.String type)
gets the best modality for the response to the user based on the current locatio (room) and the kind of message that should be passed to the user (question, statement, reminder etc)

Parameters:
type - the kind of message
Returns:
a RDF URI describing the best modality to use
